title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
the resurrected remains of the great wyrm Ansur. We should return to camp and inform Duke Ravengard.

After you have defeated Ansur speak to Duke Ravengard.

The Blade of the Frontier All Outcomes and Endings

If Wyll broke his contract and still failed.

We failed Mizora's rescue mission. As punishment for breaking his contract, Wyll was dragged into Avernus, where he will battle demons as a horrid lemure.

Endings (Wyll's father survives):
